replies.body: It's moments like this when you appreciate humanity to its fullest.

Just to clarify, you mean this not in a sarcastic "I don't want to live on this planet anymore" way but because Lissandra is approaching an unwelcome situation with humor and patience instead of rage... right?
Lissandra name is Hue-main.
Right :)
Yes, Just to clarify.
what about champs who start the game fed {{champion:79}} {{champion:223}}
{{champion:6}}?
Nah, he's just bloated. Those enchiladas the night before...
Yeah I don't know what that green icon is either.
I think it's a new item.
Don't you dare! My waifu is just thick boned.

That wouldn't explain the surgical scar on his stomach.
And everything below the waist.
I blame mermaids.
All those techmaturgical equipment take up a lot of space.
Once had a tahm kench who literally only used W and R and wouldn't shut up about being fed.

I find it very offensive you are saying that champs that are slightly overweight obviously eat too much. Some people have it in their genetics! It's not  their fault, they can't control it! Fat shaming is wrong and you should feel bad. 
**/S**
I blame the patriarchy
Wai I get downvoted Q_Q

Say Kappa instead of /S next time

/s

Wait shit, i mean Kappa.
Good idea.
{{champion:6}} I blame the head master.
League =/= Logic
yet im not a rapper

so stop RAPPIN AT ME
confused........... am I
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOH!

rofl, yep XD  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Enter Cho Gath.
Yes! Jax would also not be able to use his Q or have the energy to use his E!
But he uses mana.
Exactly, he'll never have the energy!
Hell never have the energy sir

"He'll be fat, thus slower, then we'll make our move."

Is he talking about how to kill Jax or America?
Why not both
Mexican music ensues
An example of an awesome member of the League community. You do you, Lissandra.

I played with a Mord who LITERALLY told my team he fed the enemy laner Fiora (around 7 kills in lane) so we could kill Fiora and he could ult her to have the ghost. Needless to say i'm not sure she ever died in that game.

See, this is where his logic fails.  It would make more sense if he fed both himself AND Fiora, that way he could later use her feed against her to push lane and win team fights.  Even then... wouldn't he want to ult adc for ranged ghost?  Esp since they can't use abilities.  Man.  Sorry you had to play with someone like that!

This has been a viable strat since at least 2012
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CIWRCfwrHQM
Will a fat Leblanc be easier to catch? :o
No, she uses magic to warp around. You can however catch a fat Nidalee since she's incapable of using pounce.
Actually I found out that my cat has been a fed Nidalee this entire time.
wish i met more players like liss
Legit strategy with Veigar and Morde.

"nom nom nom nom" 
Jax, why did you take cookies master?  
"nrompf mompf mampf nom" 
Jax? JAAAX?
Plans within Plans.
Hahahahaha I appreciate your contribution to life sir
{{champion:98}} /all 9x report Lissandra.

One time I had 3 people like that on our team

There was a lot of caps and at one point we had 8 wards in hat one Bush next to baron and the enemy had to get their entire team over to break them all before taking baron.

We won anyways LOL
